q1: How has Atletico Madrid been doing with their last few games?
a1: Not too well, they've been losing all their games recently.
q2: Maybe Madrid needs a new coach.
q3: Who do you think they should hire?
a3: I think they should contact Zidane
q4: Does Zidane have experience as a coach?
a4: Zidane was last season coach of Real Madrid
q5: Would Zidane doe well as coach of Atletico?
a5: Of course, he's had a lot of success in limited time as a coach
